name: 4th Edition of Singapore Nursing Research Conference
content: Don't miss out on the 4th Edition of the Singapore Nursing Research Conference (NURSING 2024) from March 21-23, 2024\. This HYBRID EVENT will explore the theme “Leading Innovation and Pathways Transforming Nursing Future,” and provide the option to participate in person in Singapore or virtually from anywhere in the world. Join the world's finest nurses at the Nursing Research Conference 2024, where you can enrich your nursing skills and acquire a competitive edge in the healthcare industry. This prestigious global event is a perfect platform for nursing professionals from all corners of the world to collaborate, connect and exchange innovative ideas. This Nursing 2024 guarantees an exciting experience for all attendees. Over three days of Nursing Conference, you'll have the chance to learn from the top-notch minds in nursing, covering cutting-edge nursing science, evidence-based research, and advanced artificial intelligence technology - all relevant to today's healthcare landscape. This Nursing Conference 2024 is the ultimate destination for nurses seeking to stay ahead of the curve in their profession. In addition to the keynote sessions, interactive panel discussions, and workshops, you'll have ample opportunities to network and connect with fellow nursing professionals. Don't let the opportunity to attend Nursing Conferences 2024 pass you by. This event is packed with valuable insights, networking opportunities, and educational resources that will help you take your nursing career to new heights. Nursing Conferences, Nursing Conferences 2024, Nursing Research Conferences, Nursing Research Conferences 2024, Nursing Conference, Nursing Research Conference, Nursing Conference 2024, Nursing Research Conference 2024, International Nursing Conference, International Nursing Conferences, International Nursing Conference 2024, International Nursing Conferences 2024, Nursing Conference Singapore, Nursing Conferences Singapore, World Conference on Nursing, World Conferences on Nursing, Global Nursing Conferences, Global Nursing Conference Reach us at: Contact Email: nursing-research@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1-434-264-7183 Dates: March 21-23, 2024 Venue: Hotel Bugis 390 Victoria St, Singapore 188061 Website: https://nursingresearchconference.com/ Abstract submission: https://nursingresearchconference.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://nursingresearchconference.com/register Social Media Links: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NursingCongres/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/NursesConf LinkedIn: Magnus Group YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw
